channel.title: Education Incorporated Boutique School
channel.managingEditor: eduinc@solidgoldstudios.co.za (EduInc Private School | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
channel.copyright: © EduInc Private School - all rights reserved
channel.description:
From Education Incorporated Boutique School (EduInc) in Fourways South Africa, comes a selection of productions from the language departments, as well as useful news, interviews, discussions, case studies and lesson outputs.

Recorded and produced at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
channel.itunes:subtitle: An insight into how EduInc helps prepare its pupils for the world beyond school.
channel.itunes:author: EduInc Private School | Solid Gold Podcast Studios

item.title: English Poetry Reading | 2019 Grade 8s
item.itunes:title: English Poetry Reading | 2019 Grade 8s
item.itunes:subtitle: Our 2019 Grade 8s complete an English poetry task
item.description:
Mr Galanakis and Mrs Ostrowick, EduInc English teachers, share their pupils' poetry task with us.


Find out more about this leading school and how your child could benefit from its small classes and affordable private education. http://educationincorporated.co.za


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
item.content:encoded:
Mr Galanakis and Mrs Ostrowick, EduInc English teachers, share their pupils' poetry task with us.


Find out more about this leading school and how your child could benefit from its small classes and affordable private education. http://educationincorporated.co.za


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
